Name: Oil and Gas
Summary: The Global dataset of oil and natural gas production, prices, exports, and net exports.

Sections.Title: Dataset Information
Sections.Content: Oil production and prices data are for 1932-2014 (2014 data are incomplete); gas production and prices are for 1955-2014; export and net export data are for 1986-2013. Country codes have been modified from earlier versions to conform to Correlates of War (COW) and Quality of Government (QOG) standards.
